price: Allah Mamallaki gaskiya, Yã ɗaukaka. Bãbu abin bautãwa, fãce Shi. Shĩ ne Ubangijin Al'arshi, mai daraja.
arabic: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fataʿālā al-lahu al-maliku al-ḥaqu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-karīmi
